articles.author: GERALD IMRAY, MOGOMOTSI MAGOME
articles.title: The ANC party that freed South Africa from apartheid loses its 30-year majority in landmark election - The Associated Press
articles.description: The African National Congress party has lost its parliamentary majority in a historic election result that puts South Africa on a new political path for the first time since the end of the apartheid system of white minority rule 30 years ago. With more than 9…
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG (AP) The African National Congress party lost its parliamentary majority in a historic election result Saturday that puts South Africa on a new political path for the first time since th… [+6061 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: South Africa’s ANC loses 30-year parliamentary majority after election - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: African National Congress vote share drops to 40 percent, forcing it to seek coalition partners to form government.
